name: Shenzhen Cowae Technology Development Co
overview:
Shenzhen Cowae Technology Development Co., LTD established in 2008. We focus on the innovation and design. Our current development includes peripheral computer products, mobile phone and personal care products. All products pass CE and FCC regulation, and “Made for iPhone” authentication.

In 2011, we passed the authorization process and become “Made for iPhone” licensee.

In 2011, we created our own brand “cowae”. In the same year, we designed iCan, which is an intelligent and multifunctional toolbox which is compatible with iPhone, iPod and other kinds of phones.
